snippet: We publish this morning an answer to our article of Thursday, in regard to the action of the Brooklyn Corporation concerning the Long Island Railroad. We have but few words to say in reply. We cannot think of going into a discussion of the entire ...
lead_paragraph: We publish this morning an answer to our article of Thursday, in regard to the action of the Brooklyn Corporation concerning the Long Island Railroad. We have but few words to say in reply. We cannot think of going into a discussion of the entire legal merits of the case.
